mapper.update: update hotelEvent set hitCount = hitCount+1 where eventNum=#{eventNum}
mapper.select: select saveFilename, eventNum, subject, content, adminIdx, created, startDate, endDate from hotelEvent where eventNum=#{eventNum}
mapper.insert: insert into hotelEventReply(replyNum, eventNum, content, userIdx) values(HOTELEVENTREPLY_SEQ.nextval,#{eventNum},#{content},#{userIdx})
mapper.select: select NVL(COUNT(*),0) from hoteleventreply where eventNum=#{eventNum}
